Description:
UST SparkWheel Fire Starter is an easily used, one-handed, super light, compact fire starter that generates sparks even in cold, wet and windy conditions. Designed to spark hundreds of times, it is made of high-quality brass and has an adjustable tension spring to ensure a hot spark every time, making it an essential part of your emergency kit.

Features:

  • Ultra-Lightweight, Reliable Fire Starter
  • Easy One-Handed Use
  • Made of High-Quality Brass
  • Has Adjustable Tension Spring Ensures Hot Spark Every Time

Title: 19L Solar Shower
Description:
The UST Solar Shower let's you enjoy a warm shower in the outdoors and camping. You simply fill it with water and place it in the sun to draw in the heat. It is also great for home emergencies if hot water isn't available.

Features:

  • Black Material Absorbs Heat Making Water Inside Warm
  • Holds Up To 19L (5 Gallons) of Water
  • Provides Multiple Showers Per Use
  • Can heat up to 40 degrees on a 20 degree day after 3hrs in sun

Steps:

  • Before using, rinse container with 1 Tablespoon of Baking Soda and Warm Water
  • Fill container with Water and place on a Flat Surface with the Black Side Exposed to Direct Sunlight
  • The Water should be Hot in approx. 3 hours (in most cases) as stated in the chart above.

Title: TekFire Pro Fuel-Free Lighter - Orange
Description:
The UST TekFire Pro Fuel-Free Lighter allows for quick and easy fire starting. It is compact, lightweight, windproof, flameless, electronic, and rechargeable, plus comes with its own USB cord. No fuel needed as there is no flame, this lighter works with two electrodes creating an arc between them that you can put tinder between to spark. Comes with a ParaTinder Wrist Lanyard that unwinds to 91.5cm of all-purpose paracord with an added single tinder thread.

Lighter

  • No Fuel & No Flame Lighter
  • Powered by USB-Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery
  • Has 10 Second Time-Out Safety Feature
  • Indicator Light Flashes Red While Charging and Solid Red when Fully Charged
  • Includes ParaTinder Wrist Lanyard
  • Lanyard can be unwound for 91.5cm of all-purpose paracord with single tinder thread
  • Includes USB Cord for Easy Recharging form any USB Port
  • Operate Lighter: Release wire safety catch, press black button to open lid, & hold down front power button
  • Includes Complete Use and Care Instructions

ParaTinder

  • To Ignite ParaTinder, Expose Red Core Thread and Light With the TekFire
  • Use Inner Paracord Strands for Sewing Thread, Sutures, Fishing Line, and More
  • Only Ignite Red Core Strands
  • White Inner Core Strands or Outer Coloured Jacket can Melt Plastic Residue on Electrodes Blocking the Electrical Arc and Prevent Lighter from Working

Clearing Residue from Electrodes

  • Use wooden toothpick or plastic knife to gently scrape clear
  • To Avoid electric shock or burn, DO NOT push electric arc button on while cleaning

Title: Reusable Hand Warmer
Description:
The UST Reusable Hand Warmer is a temporary warming tool for when you need an extra heat source whether you're at home or out in the elements. It is environmentally friendly and can be used again and again, so say goodbye to the one-use disposable things you've been using before.

Features:

  • Heats up to 54 C in just 15 seconds
  • Provides heat for up to 2 hours
  • Environmentally friendly
  • Sodium acetate and water are activated by bending a metal disk inside the pouch
  • When heat runs out, warmer can be rejuventated with boiling water

How to use:

  • Press metal button on the disc hand warmer until it clicks and liquid starts to crystallize
  • Massage hand warmer until completely crystallized
  • Apply hand warmer to desired area
  • Insulate hand warmer in a towel or clother material for longer lasting heat

How to recharge:

  • Bring pot of water to a rolling boil, then lower heat to a slow simmer
  • Carefully place hand warmer in simmering water
  • Keep hand warmer in simmering water until crystals completey dissolve & liquid turns clear (approx. 15 minutes)
  • Carefully remove hand warmer and allow to cool to room temperature before use
  • If heat pack re-crystalizes after boiling, re-boil until crystals completely dissove

Warning:

  • CAUTION: DO NOT MICROWAVE
  • Contents hot after boiling/recharging
  • Allow to cool to room temperature before handling or reactivating
  • Do not puncture or open pouch
  • Do not ingest liquid contents
  • Avoid freezing

Title: 30ft Paracord 1100 Green Camo
Description:
The UST 30ft Paracord 1100 Green Camo has multiple outdoor uses such as roping up shelters, lashing gear together, and creating bracelets, zipper pulls, handle wraps, lanyards, and more. You can also tease out the core threads to use as fishing line or sewing thread, plus includes a convenient carabiner and is wrapped up for compact travel and storage.

Features:

  • Heavy Duty 1100 Utility Cord
  • 100% Nylon
  • Green Camo thread
  • Essential Gear for Camping, Backpacking, Hunting, Wilderness Survival, and More
  • Tease Out Core Threads to use as Fishing Line, Sewing Thread, First Aid, and More
  • Includes Handy Carabiner
  • Length: 30 feet (9 meters)
  • Weight: 150g
  • Not Suitable for Climbing

Warning:

  • This product is not designed to hold you body weight or lift heavy objects overhead
  • Do not use this products for climbing, repelling, lifting heavy objects or other situations where personal safety or valuable property can be endangered
  • The working load and weight rating are based on static tests and the limits shown should never be exceeded
  • Shock conditions (swing, stress, jerk) can reduce working loads by more than 33%
  • Never stand in line with rope under tension; such rope, particularly nylon rope, may recoil (snap back)
  • Never use this product to secure large flat surfaces or objects
  • All ropes should be replaced if signs of wear, such as broken fibers are apparent
  • Knots reduce the strength of the rope more than 50%, splicing is preferable
  • Misuse can result in serious injury or death

Title: Reusable Heat Pack
Description:
The UST Reusable Heat Pack is a temporary warming tool for when you need an extra source of warmth. It can heat up to 54 C in just 15 seconds and provides heat for up to two hours. Whether your at home or out in the elements, this heat pack will keep you toasty again and again.

Features:

  • Heats up to 54 C in just 15 seconds
  • Provides heat for up to 2 hours
  • Environmentally friendly
  • Sodium acetate and water are activated by bending a metal disk inside the pouch
  • When heat runs out, heat pack can be rejuventated with boiling water

How to use:

  • Press metal button on the disc hand warmer until it clicks and liquid starts to crystallize
  • Massage heat pack until completely crystallized
  • Apply heat pack to desired area
  • Insulate heat pack in a towel or clother material for longer lasting heat

How to recharge:

  • Bring pot of water to a rolling boil, then lower heat to a slow simmer
  • Carefully place hand warmer in simmering water
  • Keep hand warmer in simmering water until crystals completey dissolve & liquid turns clear (approx. 15 minutes)
  • Carefully remove hand warmer and allow to cool to room temperature before use
  • If heat pack re-crystalizes after boiling, re-boil until crystals completely dissove

Warning:

  • CAUTION: DO NOT MICROWAVE
  • Contents hot after boiling/recharging
  • Allow to cool to room temperature before handling or reactivating
  • Do not puncture or open pouch
  • Do not ingest liquid contents
  • Avoid freezing

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Category: Survival  / Lighters & Fire Starters / Fire Starters
Title: StrikeForce Fire starter with Tinder
Description:
UST StrikeForce Fire starter with Tinder is a high-performance, flint-based fire starter that generates three times the heat of an ordinary match and will last up to 4,000 strikes.

Features:

  • Flint-Based Fire Starter
  • Two Pieces of Light-Me Tinder
  • Tinder Stored in Storage Compartment
  • Generates Three Times the Heat of an Ordinary Match
  • Sparks in Adverse Weather conditions
  • Ignites Wide Range of Tinder
  • Extra Lanyard Hole for Additional Attachments
  • Striker Built into the Detachable Cap Protects Flint and Prevents Unintended Sparks

Instructions:

  • Open case and hold metal striker against flint rod
  • Apply pressure along rod to create sparks
  • Direct sparks downward onto prepared surface to ignite tinder

Title: Green Reflective Tube Tarp

Description:
The UST ParaTinder Black Shoe Laces are 1,600mm long, made of all-purpose paracord with an added single tinder thread to ensure you always have fire tinder with you no matter where you go. One size fits most boots and we recomment wrapping excess around your ankles so its available to use when needed.

  • Single Tinder Thread

Title: TekFire LED Fuel-Free Lighter - Grey
Description:
The UST TekFire LED Fuel-Free Lighter allows for quick and easy fire starting, plus features a bright LED light at the bottom of the lighter. It is compact, lightweight, windproof, flameless, electronic, and rechargeable, plus comes with its own USB cord. No fuel needed as there is no flame, this lighter works with two electrodes creating an arc between them that you can put tinder between to spark. Comes with a ParaTinder Wrist Lanyard that unwinds to 91.5cm of all-purpose paracord with an added single tinder thread.

Lighter

  • No Fuel & No Flame Lighter
  • LED Light on the Bottom
  • Powered by USB-Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery
  • Has 10 Second Time-Out Safety Feature
  • LED Light Works Independantly
  • Indicator Light Flashes Red While Charging and Solid Red when Fully Charged
  • Includes ParaTinder Wrist Lanyard
  • Lanyard can be unwound for 91.5cm of all-purpose paracord with single tinder thread
  • Includes USB Cord for Easy Recharging form any USB Port
  • Operate Lighter: Release wire safety catch, press black button to open lid, & hold down front power button
  • Operate LED Light: Press power button twice to turn on - Press power button twice to turn off
  • (Light Will Not Engage When Lighter is Operating)
  • Includes Complete Use and Care Instructions

ParaTinder

  • To Ignite ParaTinder, Expose Red Core Thread and Light With the TekFire
  • Use Inner Paracord Strands for Sewing Thread, Sutures, Fishing Line, and More
  • Only Ignite Red Core Strands
  • White Inner Core Strands or Outer Coloured Jacket can Melt Plastic Residue on Electrodes Blocking the Electrical Arc and Prevent Lighter from Working

Clearing Residue from Electrodes

  • Use wooden toothpick or plastic knife to gently scrape clear
  • To Avoid electric shock or burn, DO NOT push electric arc button on while cleaning

Title: Woodland Tool Set
Description:
The UST survival Woodlands Tool Set is the perfect collection of tools for all your outdoor needs. The set includes a ParaHatchet, ParaKnife 4.0, and a ParaKnife 2.0 Multi-Tool knife, all with ParaTinder Utility Cord-wrapped handles, as well as a Sharpening Stone, and a full flint fire starter with an attached emergency whistle.

Woodlands Tool Set Features:

Each cutting tool features a tough, stainless steel blade Black-oxide finish reduces rust and protects the blades The ParaTinder Utility Cord can be unwound and used as an all-purpose paracord with an added single tinder thread Flint fire starter produces a spark in even the worst conditions and will ignite a wide range of tinder Integrated whistle for an easy-to-use signal device Protective sheaths for each cutting tool included Dual Sharpening Stone offers a combination of coarse and fine textures for repairing damage to the blade and polishing the edge for a razor-sharp finish

Tool Set includes:

ParaHatchet: This tough 4mm thick stainless steel hatchet easily chops firewood and limbs. The multi-size hex wrenches (3/8, 9/16, and 11/16) can be safely accessed with sheath in place. A quick-action rope cutter on the back adds extra functionality and the black-oxide finish reduces rust and protects the blade. Protective sheath for safe storage included.

ParaKnife 4.0: A durable 4 inch (101mm) long, 4mm thick stainless steel blade is a handy knife to have on the trail. The saw tooth blade adds maximum cutting functionality and the black-oxide finish reduces rust and protects the blade. Protective sheath for safe storage included.

ParaKnife 2.0: A tough 1.5 inch (38mm) long, 2.3mm thick stainless steel blade is a handy multi-tool to have on the trail. The saw tooth blade adds maximum cutting functionality and the black-oxide finish reduces rust and protects the blade. This multi-tool knife includes a 2 inch ruler, hex wrenches, and a bottle opener. Protective sheath for safe storage included.

ParaTinder Utility Cord: The ParaTinder handle wrap provides secure grip in all weather conditions and unwraps to provide around 8 feet (2.4m) of paracord with an added single tinder thread. To ignite ParaTinder, expose red core thread and light with included fire starter. Inner paracord strands can be used as sewing thread, sutures, fishing line, and more.

Fire Starter: The flint fire starter produces sparks in even the worst conditions. Lightweight and compact, it is easily stored in the included protective sheath. Will ignite a wide range of tinders.

Whistle: The wrist lanyard features an integrated whistle for an easy-to-use signal device.

Title: TekFire Charge Fuel Free Lighter/Power Bank
Description:
The lightweight and compact UST TekFire Charge Fuel-Free Lighter allows for quick and easy fire starting and features an emergency power bank to charge your other electronic devices on the go. This lighter is windproof, flameless, and electronic, it requires no butane fuel or adjustments for altitude. The pack includes a ParaTinder Utility Cord wrist lanyard that can be unwound, providing about 90cm of all-purpose paracord with an additional single tinder thread. The lighter also comes with a USB cord for easy recharging from any USB port.

TekFire Lighter

  • No Fuel & No Flame Lighter
  • Powered by USB-Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery
  • Power bank and lighter work independently, powered by USB-rechargeable 3000mAh lithium-ion battery
  • Has 10 Second Time-Out Safety Feature
  • Indicator Light Flashes Red While Charging and Solid Red when Fully Charged
  • Includes ParaTinder Wrist Lanyard
  • Lanyard can be unwound for 91.5cm of all-purpose paracord with single tinder thread
  • Includes USB Cord for Easy Recharging form any USB Port
  • Recharges fully in 3 hours
  • Lighter will last for thousands of ignitions
  • Operate Lighter: Release wire safety catch, press black button to open lid, & hold down front power button
  • Size approx 140 x 30 x 30mm
  • Includes Complete Use and Care Instructions

ParaTinder

  • To Ignite ParaTinder, Expose Red Core Thread and Light With the TekFire
  • Use Inner Paracord Strands for Sewing Thread, Sutures, Fishing Line, and More
  • Only Ignite Red Core Strands
  • White Inner Core Strands or Outer Coloured Jacket can Melt Plastic Residue on Electrodes Blocking the Electrical Arc and Prevent Lighter from Working

How to Operate the Lighter

  • To operate lighter, release wire safety catch and press black button to open lid; hold down front power button
  • Blue indicator lights show the charge level of the lighter and power; lights flash blue when charging and all four lights are solid blue when fully charged
  • Lighter has 10 second time-out safety feature
  • To ignite ParaTinder, expose red core thread and light with the TekFire

Clearing Residue from Electrodes

  • Use wooden toothpick or plastic knife to gently scrape clear
  • To Avoid electric shock or burn, DO NOT push electric arc button on while cleaning

Title: SplashFlash LED Light Black

Title: StarFlash Floating Signal Mirror
Description:
The UST StarFlash Floating Signal Mirror is lightweight with a built-in precision aiming system for accurate signaling and won't sink if dropped in water. It is a class tool for camping, backpacking, emergency preparedness, and for personal grooming as well.

Features:

  • Made of 100% Lexan Polycarbonate
  • Mirrored Surface: Vacuum Desposition Metalization
  • Targeting Star: Retro-Reflective Fabric
  • Ultralight Signal Mirror with Built-In Precision Aiming System
  • Virtually Unbreakable Mirror Works in Overcast Conditions
  • Floats if Dropped in Water
  • Has a Lanyard hole for Convenient Attachment

Steps:

  • Stand facing the sun or light source in an open area with a clear view of the sky and horizon (if possible)
  • Reflect light from the light source onto your hand or nearby surface without blocking light from the light source to mirror surface
  • Slowly bring the mirror toward your eye until the mirror touches your cheek
  • Look through the star at the reflected light on your hand or other surface - a bright glowing spot with show a star (the aim indicator)
  • Holding the mirror close to your eye, still looking at the aim indicator, slowly turn and angle the mirror until you 'place' the aim indicator directly on the object you wish to flash
  • If no target is in sight, continually sweep the horizon

Title: 50ft Paracord 325 Green Camo
Description:
The UST 50ft Paracord 325 Green Camo has multiple outdoor uses such as roping up shelters, lashing gear together, and creating bracelets, zipper pulls, handle wraps, lanyards, and more. You can also tease out the core threads to use as fishing line or sewing thread, plus includes a convenient carabiner and is wrapped up for compact travel and storage.

Features:

  • Heavy Duty 325 Utility Cord
  • 100% Nylon
  • Essential Gear for Camping, Backpacking, Hunting, Wilderness Survival, and More
  • Tease Out Core Threads to use as Fishing Line, Sewing Thread, First Aid, and More
  • Includes Handy Carabiner
  • Length: 50 feet (15meters)
  • Weight: 74g
  • Not Suitable for Climbing

Warning:

  • This product is not designed to hold you body weight or lift heavy objects overhead
  • Do not use this products for climbing, repelling, lifting heavy objects or other situations where personal safety or valuable property can be endangered
  • The working load and weight rating are based on static tests and the limits shown should never be exceeded
  • Shock conditions (swing, stress, jerk) can reduce working loads by more than 33%
  • Never stand in line with rope under tension; such rope, particularly nylon rope, may recoil (snap back)
  • Never use this product to secure large flat surfaces or objects
  • All ropes should be replaced if signs of wear, such as broken fibers are apparent
  • Knots reduce the strength of the rope more than 50%, splicing is preferable
  • Misuse can result in serious injury or death

Title: Base Bug Tent
Description:
The UST Base Bug Tent is a single-person mini shelter that provides protection from the smallest gnats, no-see-ums, mosquitos, and other disease-carrying insects. Lightweight and efficient sleeping protection, it replaces a full-size tent and is ideal for ultralight backpacking, hunting trips, wilderness survival and more. You can also combine this with a tarp for added ground cover protection.

  • Single Person Tent
  • Flame Retardant Fine Mesh Construction
  • Efficient Insect Protection
  • Easy to Set Up
  • Includes Stakes, Shock-Corded Poles, and Stuff Sack
  • Dimensions Erected: 53mm x 183mm x 86mm
  • Dimensions Packed: 457mm x 90mm
  • Weight: 567g

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: All-Weather Orange Reflective Tarp
Description:
The UST All-Weather Orange Reflective Tarp is a versatile ultra-lightweight multi-use tarp that sets up in minutes with the included guy lines and steel stakes. It can be used as a ground cloth, single person sleeping shelter, gear protection, and even as thermal protection in emergency situations. You can also use the reverse side to rap around yourself for thermal insulation and use its reflectivity for emergency signalling.

  • Orange Multi-Use Tarp
  • Used as Tarp, Ground Cloth, Thermal Blanket, and More
  • Provides Excellent Coverage in All Weather Conditions
  • Aluminized Reverse Side for Thermal Insulation/Emergency Signalling
  • Includes Tarp, Guy Lines, Steel Stakes, and Stuff Sacks
  • Dimensions Flat: 2,440mm x 1,830mm
  • Dimensions Packed: 216mm x 102mm x 102mm
  • Weight: 425g

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: Orange Reflective Tube Tarp
Description:
The UST Orange Reflective Tube Tarp is an all-weather, versatile, lightweight, flame-retardant tarp that can be used as a tent, ground cloth, or even thermal protection in emergencies. It has a hidden zipper that transforms the tarp into a tube-shaped sleeping tent to provide protection from the damp ground below your and the elements from above, plus the tarp's reverse side is aluminized for wrapping around yourself for thermal insulation and is reflective for emergency signaling.

  • Ultra-light, Compact, Versatile & Flame-Retardant
  • All-weather Protection
  • Hidden zipper transforms tarp into tube-shaped sleeping tent
  • Provides protection from damp ground below and elements above
  • Reverse side is aluminized for thermal insulation and emergency signaling
  • Sets up in minutes
  • Includes Guy Lines, Steel Stakes, and a Stuff Sack with complete instructions attached
  • Erected Dimensions: 99cm x 213cm x 89cm
  • Packed Dimensions: 38.1cm x 10.2cm x 10.2cm
  • Weight: 794g

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: Dual Sharpening Stone
Description:
The UST Dual Sharpening Stone provides years of consistent sharpening of your knives and other blades. It is a fine texture on one side and course on the other. The course texture repairs damage and adds a rough edge, whereas the fine polishes the edge for a razor-sharp finish.

  • Course textured side to repair damage and add a rough edge
  • Fine textured side to polish the edge for a razor-sharp finish
  • Provides years of consistent sharpening
  • Ideal for camping, ultralight backpacking, hunting, emergency preparedness, and more

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: JetScream Micro Floating Whistle
Description:
The UST JetScream Micro Floating Whistle is a wilderness signaling device that has an ear-piercing 112 decibel shriek so it can easily be heard over most natural and man-made noises, making it ideal for attaching to a keyring, backpack, personal flotation device and more. It is ultra-compact made of durable ABS plastic and a pea-less construction so it won't freeze, clog or rust and is just as effective wet.

  • Ultra-compact, flat, buoyant signal whistle for emergencies and wilderness survival shrieks
  • Durable ABS plastic, waterproof and buoyant
  • Pea-less design won't freeze, clog or rust
  • Effective even when wet, enables use in all weather conditions
  • Shrieks at a loud 112dB (decibels)
  • Perfect size to attach to a keyring, backpack, personal flotation device and more
  • Dimensions: 30mm x 25mm x 6mm
  • Weight: 3g

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: Orange Reflective Hex Tarp
Description:
The UST Orange Reflective Hex Tarp is a six-sided, multi-use tap that can be used as a tarp, tent shelter, ground cloth, thermal blanket, or with the aluminized reflect reverse side, for emergency signalling or to wrap around you for thermal insulation. This six-sided design provides excellent coverage in all weather conditions, and its single person size eliminates the need for a full size tarp. Ideal for camping, ultralight backpacking, hunting, outdoor survival, and more.

  • Flame-Retardant Six-Sided Multi-Use Tarp
  • Used as Tarp, Tent Shelter, Ground Cloth, Thermal Blanket, and More
  • Provides Excellent Coverage in All Weather Conditions
  • Aluminized Reverse Side for Thermal Insulation/Emergency Signalling
  • Includes Tarp, Guy Lines, Steel Stakes, and Stuff Sacks

Title: See-Me 1.0 LED Light Orange
Description:
The UST See-Me 1.0 LED Light Orange is an ideal personal locator light, visible for up to 5.5 km on a dark clear night, that ensures you can be quickly located in an emergency whether your on the trail or on the water. IPX7 Waterproof rating, this see-me light is great for backpacking, camping, hunting, boating, having on floatation devices (PFDs), and more.

  • Lumens: 20Lm of 360-degree Light
  • Battery Type: 2 x AAA Alkaline Batteries (Not Included)
  • Run Time: 17 Hours
  • Water-Resistant: IPX7 - Works submerged at 1 meter for 30 minutes
  • Approved by US Coast Guard (USCG) & exceeds their requirement of 1 Nautical mile (1.9km) visibility
  • Visible up to 5.5km on a dark clear night
  • Lifetime bulb never needs replacing
  • Easy Twist On/Off Control
  • Includes Lanyard and Hook-and-Loop Strap
  • Dimensions: 126mm x 25mm
  • Weight: 51g

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: See-Me 1.0 Orange LED Strobe Light
Description:
The UST See-Me 1.0 Orange LED Strobe Light is great to have for backpacking, camping, hunting, boating, floatation devices (PFDs), and more. Ideal personal locator strobe that works on the trail or on the water, ensuring you can be quickly located in an emergency.

  • Lumens: 28Lm of flashing strobe light
  • Strobe Rate: 60 flashes per minute
  • Battery Type: 2 x AAA Alkaline Batteries (Not Included)

Title: StarFlash Micro Signal Mirror
Description:
The UST StarFlash Micro Floating Signal Mirror is lightweight with a built-in precision aiming system for accurate signaling. It is a class tool for camping, backpacking, emergency preparedness, and, in addition to using it for emergency signaling, its handy for personal grooming as well.

Features:

  • Ultralight, Micro Sized Signal Mirror
  • Targeting Star: Retro-Reflective Fabric
  • Built-In Precision Aiming System
  • Virtually Unbreakable Mirror Works in Overcast Conditions
  • Has a Lanyard hole for Convenient Attachment

Steps:

  • Stand facing the sun or light source in an open area with a clear view of the sky and horizon (if possible)
  • Reflect light from the light source onto your hand or nearby surface without blocking light from the light source to mirror surface
  • Slowly bring the mirror toward your eye until the mirror touches your cheek
  • Look through the star at the reflected light on your hand or other surface - a bright glowing spot with show a star (the aim indicator)
  • Holding the mirror close to your eye, still looking at the aim indicator, slowly turn and angle the mirror until you 'place' the aim indicator directly on the object you wish to flash
  • If no target is in sight, continually sweep the horizon

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: 100ft Paracord 550 Green Camo
Description:
The UST 100ft Paracord 550 Green Camo has multiple outdoor uses such as roping up shelters, lashing gear together, and creating bracelets, zipper pulls, handle wraps, lanyards, and more. You can also tease out the core threads to use as fishing line or sewing thread, plus includes a convenient carabiner and is wrapped up for compact travel and storage.

Features:

  • Heavy Duty 550 Utility Cord
  • 100% Nylon
  • Essential Gear for Camping, Backpacking, Hunting, Wilderness Survival, and More
  • Tease Out Core Threads to use as Fishing Line, Sewing Thread, First Aid, and More
  • Includes Handy Carabiner
  • Length: 100 feet (30 meters)
  • Weight: 148g
  • Not Suitable for Climbing

Warning:

  • This product is not designed to hold you body weight or lift heavy objects overhead
  • Do not use this products for climbing, repelling, lifting heavy objects or other situations where personal safety or valuable property can be endangered
  • The working load and weight rating are based on static tests and the limits shown should never be exceeded
  • Shock conditions (swing, stress, jerk) can reduce working loads by more than 33%
  • Never stand in line with rope under tension; such rope, particularly nylon rope, may recoil (snap back)
  • Never use this product to secure large flat surfaces or objects
  • All ropes should be replaced if signs of wear, such as broken fibers are apparent
  • Knots reduce the strength of the rope more than 50%, splicing is preferable
  • Misuse can result in serious injury or death

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: Watertight Survival Kit 1.0
Description:
The UST lightweight Watertight Survival Kit 1.0 includes an assortment of essential supplies, including a light stick, button compass, survival blanket and towel, and a water-resistant case. Keep this kit at home, in the car, on your boat, or in your pack so you will always be prepared. The compact Survival Reflect Blanket can be used for heat deflection, body heat insulation, as a rain and wind barrier, or as a rescue signaling device.

The kit also includes the compact, absorbent Survival Towel, a 4-inch Light Stick for soft, glowing light, and a button compass with luminous navigation points. It all fits in USTs Watertight Case 1.0, which is made of high-impact plastic and has a water-resistant O-ring seal that keeps the contents safe and dry (not intended for submersion).

Survival Kit Inclusions & Features:

  • Compact, lightweight survival essentials kit; great for backcountry camping, keeping in the car, or emergencypreparedness
  • Light Stick 4 inch light stick provides soft, glowing light
  • Survival Reflect Blanket compact, lightweight and waterproof blanket that can be used for heat deflection, bodyheat insulation, as a rain and wind barrier, or as a rescue signaling device
  • Watertight Case 1.0 large watertight, plastic case with O-ring snap closure and lanyard
  • Survival Towel absorbent, compact and lightweight
  • Button Compass durable compass features luminous navigation points
  • Lightweight, high-impact plastic case with O-ring seal keeps contents safe and dry

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Category: Survival  / Lighters & Fire Starters / Fire Starters
Title: Fire Starter Kit 1.0
Description:
The UST Fire Starter Kit 1.0 includes all the tools you need to build a fire in any conditions. The SpakForce Fire Starter is compact, high-performance, flint-based and easily generates sparks in wet/windy conditions, the WetFire Tinder is safe, lightweight tinder that you can shave off small pieces of or use the entire cube to start a fire, and the Watertight Case 1.0 will keep all of these materials bone-dry until you need them and includes its own carabiner and lanyard. This is the ultimate fire starting kit, so be prepared and get one now!

Features:

  • Watertight Case 1.0: Water-Resistant Carrying Case
  • 5 Packages of WetFire Tinder: Universal Lighting Material
  • SparForce Fire Starter: Compact High-Performance Ferro Rod Fire Starter
  • Dimensions: 108mm x 70mm x 29mm
  • Weight: 363g

How To Use SparkForce Fire Starter:

  • Open case and hold metal striker against flint rod
  • Apply pressure along rod to create sparks
  • Direct sparks downward onto prepared surface to ignite tinder

For 80 years and four generations, UST Brands has provided reliable, affordable problem-solving gear for survival situations and emergency preparedness.

Title: Clouds - Learn & Live Cards
Description:
These cards are part of the Learn & Live Card Collection. The Clouds cards describe the appearance of 10 cloud types along with additional details about elevations and their related weather patterns, which is useful for predicting imminent weather.

  • Ten Informative Cards
  • Illustrates Appearance of Cloud Types with Details About Related Weather Patterns
  • Useful For Predicting Imminent Weather
  • Pocket-Sized to Fit Anywhere
  • Laminated to be Waterproof and Durable
  • Attached with a Grommet
  • Part of UST's Learn & Live Collection

Title: Vixen Luminor 65 Magnifier 3x
Description:
The Vixen Luminor reading and pocket magnifiers are equipped with bright LED illuminators which make the reading of small letters easier in dimly lit places. The handle is light weight, easy to grip and made from low-slip eastomer resin. The pocket types are convenient for carrying in dark places such as in a concert hall. You can read a program and fliers with no problem.

Recommended Use: Reading a newspaper, magazine, catalogs, fliers, or a map. Also recommended that you keep one in a car. Tips on Choosing: A lens with diameter 70mm or larger and magnification 2_3x is recommended for reading relatively large printed materials like newspapers, magazines, and maps. Pocket types are recommended for carrying around. _ The larger the lens size, wider the field of view. Magnifiers with large lenses are heavy _ Lower magnification causes less stress for your eyes and is suitable for a long-hour use _ The covered types are convenient for carrying around because of the protection from damages

Japanese Company Vixen Co., Ltd has designed the most respected line of Binoculars, Scopes and Mounts since 1949, and they are continually improving their technology to ensure they only supply the best products.

Title: X-Blast Exploding Target System - Starter Pack
Description:
You can now turn your everyday plastic bottles into an awesome exploding target, the bigger the bottle the bigger the blast! You can also add the coloured powders to really put on a show. While the sound is extremely loud, the risk to safety and the environment is low due to the low mass involved and biodegradable powders.

Features:

  • Up to 150db explosion
  • Suitable for most 500mL to 2L bottles
  • Shoot with arrows or using firearms
  • Reuseable
  • Works with standard bike pump or air compressors (not included)

Pack Includes:

1x X-Blast Target System

4x Coloured powders - Colours may vary

1x Ballistics bag

1x Instruction manual

X-Blast allows you to turn your everyday plastic bottles into an awesome colourful exploding target, the bigger the bottle the bigger the blast!
